column4: since i upgraded to gutsy googleearth wont find my graphics card - any suggestions?
since i upgraded to gutsy googleearth wont find my graphics card - any suggestions?
how did you install google earth?
lspci | grep VGA     will give you waht kinda graphics card it is
00:02.0 VGA compatible controller: Intel Corporation Mobile 945GM/GMS, 943/940GML Express Integrated Graphics Controller (rev 03)
